subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Poll

full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_000B_01CA2232.D14FFD70

OMG!! You are so right Misty! Few people understand this concept. It is all=
 about and making yourself comfortable. Your prayers or whatever have no di=
rect effect on the ghosts per se, it effects you.

If you believe you are v=
ulnerable, you will be. If you believe that by asking for protection you wi=
ll be invulnerable, you will be.

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: M=
isty Dawn 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, August 21, 2009 1=
2:23 AM
  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Poll


    I think if you "believe" yo=
u need to do it then do it, or you will believe you are unprotected. On the=
 other hand if you have no fear then you dont give others the power to scar=
e you or intimidate you. In the end do what works best for you.

        Mi=
sty

        --- On Thu, 8/20/09, mrscaptainjack2 <jjkamp@...> wrot=
e:


          From: mrscaptainjack2 <jjkamp@...>
          Subject=
: [EVP-ITC] Re: Poll
          To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
          Date: =
Thursday, August 20, 2009, 7:45 PM


            
          Yeah, I totally=
 agree about reinforcing fears. Like, the more you think about something, t=
he more power you give it. But I hear so much about protection, I do it any=
way. I was just wondering if maybe there's something to it, like the messag=
e Frank posted says. Maybe it really does keep you safe. Maybe because you =
do it and give it power it keeps you safe? Something about the concept of e=
xpectation influencing the outcome of using the box? I don't know, just thi=
nking out loud here. I just wondered if anyone did the protection thing and=
 still had negative stuff come through.

          --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogrou=
ps .com, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@ ...> wrote:
          >
         =
 > I don't do any protection stuff, but did get this voice the other day ab=
out
          > a door. It might be a broadcast fragment, but in reverse it=
 talks about "see
          > 'em here". I think doing protection junk only=
 serves to reinforce your
          > fears.
          > 
          > F-S
 =
         >
